projects.title: Brain Tumour Classifier
projects.description: Brain tumour classification system using machine learning techniques and medical image processing.
projects.long_description: Advanced system for classifying brain tumours using machine learning techniques and medical image processing. The project implements deep learning algorithms for automated analysis of magnetic resonance images, providing accurate predictions to assist medical professionals in diagnosis.

projects.title: Audio Conversion Tool with PyDub
projects.description: Application for converting and manipulating audio files using Python's PyDub library.
projects.long_description: Comprehensive application for converting and manipulating audio files using the PyDub library. Supports multiple formats, audio editing, and batch processing with an intuitive graphical interface built with Tkinter.

projects.title: COVID-19 Data Analysis
projects.description: Exploratory data analysis on the COVID-19 pandemic, including interactive visualisations and statistical insights.
projects.long_description: Comprehensive exploratory data analysis project focused on COVID-19 pandemic data. Features interactive visualizations, statistical analysis, and insights derived from global datasets. Includes time series analysis, geographical mapping, and predictive modeling.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: This very website! Developed with Flask, focusing on responsive design and performance.
projects.long_description: Modern portfolio website built with Flask framework, featuring dynamic content management, responsive design, and optimized performance. Includes blog functionality, project showcase, and contact form with email integration.

projects.title: Automation Bot
projects.description: Bot for automating repetitive tasks, including web scraping and automated data processing.
projects.long_description: Intelligent automation bot designed to handle repetitive tasks efficiently. Features web scraping capabilities using BeautifulSoup and Selenium, automated data processing, and scheduled task execution. Ideal for data collection and workflow automation.

projects.title: Price Prediction Model
projects.description: Machine learning model for stock price prediction using historical data and technical indicators.
projects.long_description: Advanced machine learning model for predicting stock prices based on historical data and technical indicators. Implements time series analysis, feature engineering, and multiple ML algorithms including LSTM neural networks for accurate predictions.

projects.title: Python Game
projects.description: Interactive game developed in Python using Pygame, with 2D graphics and a scoring system.
projects.long_description: Engaging 2D game developed using the Pygame library. Features smooth animations, collision detection, scoring system, and multiple difficulty levels. Demonstrates game development principles and object-oriented programming in Python.

projects.title: Productivity App
projects.description: Desktop application for task management and personal productivity, developed with Python and Tkinter.
projects.long_description: Comprehensive desktop application for managing tasks and boosting personal productivity. Features include task creation, categorization, priority setting, deadline tracking, and data persistence using SQLite. Built with Tkinter for a native desktop experience.
